June 20, 1955
Mr. Elmer 0, Sulser, Director
Radio and Television Communications

Bloomington, Indiana
Dear Elmer;
The University "frowns on* driving, but we con get it
by. So go ahead that way. Mileage is 6$ a mile.
I may run into you before you leave. Iâ€™m due in from

Regards,
